name: Swiss Miss Hot Cocoa Drink Mix, Milk Chocolate with Marshmallows, Hot Cocoa Bar Supplies, 37.18 oz. Canister
short_description: Contains one 37.18 oz. Easy-Grip Canister of Swiss Miss Hot Cocoa Drink Mix with Marshmallows
Enjoy the classic combination of hot cocoa mix with mini marshmallows
This Swiss Miss marshmallow hot cocoa mix contains no artificial sweeteners, preservatives, flavors or colors
Bulk hot cocoa mix canister makes about 33 servings of prepared cocoa
Stock your pantry with Swiss Miss, perfect for serving a crowd or family hot cocoa night
product_description: Now, enjoying a delicious hot cup of cocoa is even easier with Swiss Miss Milk Chocolate with Marshmallows Hot Cocoa Drink Mix in an Easy-Grip canister. The square shape of this hot cocoa mix canister makes it easier to hold versus round canisters and makes about 33 servings. Dispense just the right amount of milk chocolate flavor cocoa mix powder –– about three tablespoons for a single serving –– in a mug. Add hot water or milk for a more decadent taste, then stir, sip and savor. See package for preparation instructions for multiple servings. This Swiss Miss hot cocoa drink with marshmallows contains no artificial sweeteners, preservatives, flavors or colors and is 99.9% caffeine-free.

product_description: Enjoy the exquisite flavor of Ghirardelli's Dark Hot Cocoa Pouch! This convenient pouch makes it easy to enjoy a cup of hot cocoa wherever you go. Simply add hot water and you're ready to indulge in a cozy cup of cocoa! Made with high-quality Dutch cocoa and real milk powder, this hot cocoa mix has a robust cocoa flavor and rich aroma that will tantalize your taste buds. Enjoy the classic hot cocoa beverage or mix with hot coffee for a delicious mocha. This economic bulk packaging is perfect for hand-scooping or using with automated hot beverage machines. Enjoy the deliciousness of Ghirardelli Dark Hot Cocoa Pouch today!

name: Cocoa Classics Dark Chocolate Cocoa Mix, Sweet, Smooth, Intense Dark Chocolate Flavored, Make Hot or Iced Cocoa, Gluten Free, Kosher Dairy Friendly, 1.25oz Packets (Pack of 12)
short_description: SWEET, SMOOTH, LUXURIOUS FLAVOR: Crafted for true dark chocolate lovers, Cocoa Classics Dark Chocolate Cocoa Mix delivers a bold, rich taste with a smooth texture—no bitterness, just pure, luxurious indulgence in every sip.

MADE WITH REAL MILK: Our hot chocolate mixes are made with nonfat dry milk, leaving you with only one task. Just add hot water and watch Cocoa Classics instantly dissolve into a rich and creamy treat!
ENJOY HOT OR COLD: Whether you’re looking to warm up or cool down, cozy up on the couch, or celebrate at an outdoor BBQ, Cocoa Classics is your go-to - Anytime, Any Way!
GLUTEN FREE & KOSHER DAIRY CERTIFIED: Sip with confidence! Cocoa Classics are made with premium-quality, gluten-free ingredients that are kosher certified.

FLAVOR VARIETY: Indulge in more than just Dark Chocolate! We have delicious flavors like French vanilla, mint, raspberry and caramel to make your cocoa experience even more special. Check out our other flavors in our brand store!
product_description: Bold flavor. Smooth finish. Dark chocolate lovers, meet your new favorite cup of cocoa. Crafted with three distinct cocoas—from bold Brazilian beans to smooth Dutch blends—this mix delivers a deep, luxurious dark chocolate flavor without the bitterness. With real milk in the mix, it’s creamy, cozy, and way smoother than you’d expect from something this dark.

SERVING SUGGESTIONS: Our hot chocolate variety pack mix is perfect on it's own but you can take it up a notch by enjoying our hot chocolate with marshmallows. Add a candy cane & a drizzle of chocolate to our gingerbread hot cocoa for a decadent experience

HOT CHOCOLATE PACKETS BULK VARIETY PACK: Save time and money with our bulk hot chocolate family pack. No need to reorder too often, while keeping things exciting with the assorted instant hot chocolate flavors bulk hot cocoa packets family pack.

COCOA MIX PACKETS FOR EVERYONE: Double Donut's hot chocolate mix packets are certified kosher and dairy. You can use our mixed variety hot cocoa sets to discover your favorites and then order those instant hot chocolate packets individually
product_description: Double Donut's hot chocolate mix is bound to be your new pantry staple. Enjoy our hot cocoa packets on their own or enjoy our hot chocolate with marshmallows. product_description: Swiss Miss Salted Caramel Flavored with Other Natural Flavors Hot Cocoa Mix is a sweet, creamy beverage for caramel and chocolate lovers of all ages. The salted caramel flavored hot cocoa drink mix easily transforms into a rich, creamy hot cocoa. This Swiss Miss Hot Cocoa Mix is packaged in portioned individual envelopes, making it easy to give everybody the perfect mug of delicious salted caramel hot cocoa. You won't miss your old hot chocolate. This hot cocoa powder is made with real cocoa and nonfat milk to give you that comforting, rich and creamy taste you expect from Swiss Miss and is a gluten free hot cocoa. Preparing a mug of this hot cocoa is easy. Empty into a mug, add 8 ounces of hot water (or milk for a richer taste) and stir. Enjoy a mug as part of your morning routine or as a sweet treat in the evening. Whatever you’re warming up to, know that Swiss Miss will give you everything you need in the palm of your hands.
